summary: It is AD 924, at the end of the United Shilla Dynasty. Continuous riots sweep the land ruled by a corrupted government. Evil forces are rampant and malicious demons roam the land. YI Kwak, ... See full summary »
cast: Joon-ho Huh|Woo-sung Jung|Kwang-il Kim|Tae-hee Kim|Jeong-hak Park|Park Sang-wook|Yi-hyeon So|Ha-jun Yu
title: Joong-cheon
